definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Iceland has already begun constructing a hydrogen grid using plentiful geothermal energy.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛已经着手建设一座利用丰富地热能源的氢气站。

sentences.english: By using geothermal energy the whole building reaches low energy standard.
sentences.chinese: 通过使用地热能，整个建筑达到了低能耗标准。

sentences.english: Geothermal energy is generated in over 20 countries.
sentences.chinese: 地热能被二十多个国家作为发电能源。

sentences.english: Related: "Can Geothermal Energy Pick Up Real Steam?"
sentences.chinese: 地热能源能吸收真正的气体吗？

sentences.english: The factory uses geothermic energy, natural lighting and natural ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 该工厂使用地热能源，自然采光和自然通风。

sentences.english: The method of heating oil with the earth thermal energy self-balance is suitable for the deep oil wells with large production.
sentences.chinese: 地热能自平衡加热原油的方式适合于产液量大的深井。

definition: fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
